Name: Project Ara - Crucible
About the game: Project Ara - Crucible is a bullet hell type shoot’em’up featuring procedural content generation in addition to light RPG elements. Help Lethe Zelmiya, the forgetful wizard on her epic quest to graduate from the Myrellian Academy of Magic. Key Features The enemy waves in the 5 stages of the Crucible are randomly generated and adapts to your skill level keeping the game challenging for novices and experts alike. Players can adjust the game's challenge rating to suit their abilities. Level up to gain powerful randomized feats to defeat your foes. Lethe's Magic Runes alter her primary attacks in varied ways. Bullet Patterns contain no random elements to promote skill-based game play. Survival Mode pits you against an endless gauntlet of enemies. Early Access Ongoing Join us on Discord here:
